sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card style="width: 90%; height: 90%;">
    <v-card-text style="height: calc(100% - 64px);">
      <v-sheet max-height="10vh">
        <v-toolbar flat>
          <v-btn icon @click="closeDialog">
            <v-icon>mdi-close</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
  
          <v-btn icon class="ml-auto" @click="$refs.calendar.prev()">
            <v-icon>mdi-chevron-left</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
  
          <v-toolbar-title>
            <v-toolbar-title style="font-size: 1.5em">{{ title }} </v-toolbar-title>
          </v-toolbar-title>
  
          <v-btn icon class="mr-auto" @click="$refs.calendar.next()">
            <v-icon>mdi-chevron-right</v-icon>
          </v-btn>
  
          <v-btn outlined x-small class="mr-auto" @click="setToday" style="font-size: 10px;">
            今日
          </v-btn>
        </v-toolbar>
      </v-sheet>
  
      <v-calendar
        ref="calendar"
        v-model="value"
        :events="events"
        @change="fetchEvents"
        v-if="selectedCalendar !== null"
        :color="selectedCalendar.color"
        style="height: 100%;"
        locale="ja-jp"
        :day-format="timestamp => new Date(timestamp.date).getDate()"
        :month-format="timestamp => new Date(timestamp.date).getMonth() + 1 + ' /'"
        @click:date="showDayEvents"
        @click:more="showDayEvents"
      ></v-calendar>
    </v-card-text>
  </v-card>
</template>


<script>
import { format } from 'date-fns';
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';
import CalendarFormDialog from './CalendarFormDialog';
import DayEventList from '../events/DayEventList';

export default {
  name: 'CalendarList',
  components: { CalendarFormDialog, OtherCalendar },
  data() {
    return {
      selectedItem: [],
      selectedGroups: [],
      isCalendarDialogOpen: false,
      selectedCalendar: null,
      // events:[],
      value: format(new Date(), 'yyyy/MM/dd'),
      DayEventList,
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters('calendars', ['calendars', 'calendar']),
    ...mapGetters('groups', ['groups']),
    ...mapGetters('users', ['users']),
    ...mapGetters('events', ['events','clickedDate']),
    filteredCalendars() {
      return this.calendars.filter(calendar => calendar.name !== '会議室' && calendar.name !== '社用車' && calendar.name !== 'スタジオ');
    },
    facilityCalendar() {
      return this.calendars.filter(calendar => calendar.name === '会議室' || calendar.name === '社用車' || calendar.name === 'スタジオ');
    },
    title() {
      return format(new Date(this.value), 'yyyy年 M月');
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.fetchCalendars();
    this.fetchGroups();
    this.fetchUsers();
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapActions('calendars', [
      'fetchCalendars',
      'updateCalendar',
      'deleteCalendar',
      'setCalendar'
    ]),
    ...mapActions('groups', [
      'fetchGroups',
      'updateGroup',
      'deleteGroup',
      'setGroup'
    ]),
    ...mapActions('users', [
      'fetchUsers',
      'updateUser',
      'deleteUser',
      'setUser'
    ]),
    ...mapActions('events', [
      'fetchEvents',
      'setClickedDate'
    ]),
    initCalendar() {
      this.setCalendar({
        name: '',
        visibility: true
      });
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.setCalendar(null);
    },
    edit(calendar) {
      this.setCalendar(calendar);
    },
    del(calendar) {
      this.deleteCalendar(calendar.id);
    },
    toggleVisibility(calendar) {
      this.updateCalendar(calendar);
    },
    updateSelection(selected) {
      this.selectedGroups = selected.slice(-1);
    },
    openCalendarDialog(group) {
      this.selectedCalendar = group.calendar;  // 選択したグループに対応するカレンダーを設定
      this.isCalendarDialogOpen = true;  // ダイアログを開く
    },
    closeDialog() {
      this.isCalendarDialogOpen = false;
      this.selectedCalendar = null;
    },
    changeColor: function() {
      setTimeout(() => {
        const dayList = Array.from(
          this.$refs.calendar.$vnode.elm.getElementsByClassName(
            'v-calendar-weekly__week'
          )
        );
        dayList.map(el => {
          el.children[0].classList.add('sunday');
          el.children[6].classList.add('saturday');
        });
      },);
    },
    setToday() {
      this.value = format(new Date(), 'yyyy/MM/dd');
    },
    showDayEvents({ date }) {
      date = date.replace(/-/g, '/');
      this.setClickedDate(date);
    },
  }
};
</script>

<style>
.saturday {
  background: rgba(200, 200, 250, 0.2);
}
.sunday {
  background: rgba(250, 200, 200, 0.2);
}
</style>
